emails.subject: New alternative data source - consumer sentiment
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

As Head of Alt Data at {{company_name}}, you're always evaluating new data sources for alpha generation.

We've built something that might fill a gap in your data stack:

ReviewSignal tracks real-time consumer sentiment across 500k+ locations (restaurants, retail, hotels) by analyzing millions of reviews daily.

Why it matters:
• Leading indicator (14-day advance) for consumer discretionary earnings
• Location-level granularity for regional analysis
• NLP-processed sentiment scores, not just ratings
• Proven correlation with same-store sales

We're not another satellite imagery or credit card data provider - this is a genuinely differentiated signal.

Would it be worth 20 minutes to walk through our methodology and sample data?

Simon
Founder, ReviewSignal.ai

emails.subject: Quick comparison - how we differ from existing alt data
emails.preview: Not satellite, not credit card, not web traffic
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

Wanted to clarify how ReviewSignal fits into the alt data landscape:

SATELLITE IMAGERY (Orbital Insight, RS Metrics)
+ Good for parking lot counts
- Lagging indicator, weather-dependent
- Expensive ($100k+/year)

CREDIT CARD DATA (Earnest, Second Measure)
+ Transaction-level detail
- Regulatory scrutiny increasing
- Panel bias issues
- Commoditized

WEB TRAFFIC (SimilarWeb)
+ Digital engagement
- Doesn't capture in-store experience
- Easy to game

REVIEWSIGNAL (Consumer Sentiment)
+ Real customer voice - unfiltered feedback
+ Leading indicator (sentiment shifts before sales)
+ Location-level granularity
+ Low regulatory risk (public data)
+ Affordable pilot programs

We're complementary to what you likely already have.

Happy to discuss how other funds are using sentiment data alongside their existing alt data stack.

Simon
